thread.title: Nicole Swiderski

author: Nicole Swiderski
title: Nicole Swiderski
text: I had two housesits until now and both were great. The Website trustedhousesitters.com works really well, requires and gives good info for both sides, it is super easy to use and contacts i between sitters and host are easy as well. There are many possibilities all around the world, so one can find the perfect place to sit vor the perfect sitter for your home. The price is well worth it. I will keep on traveling with it. Fully recomnended.
